plot outline: This is a comedy drama about 5 college kids who want to go on a bike rally in the Himalayas but do not have the resources. The film is about how these kids deal with the threat of responsibility and impending adulthood, find love and make money in a fast growing and rapidly changing urban India.
title: Mere Haule Dost
plot: This is a comedy drama about 5 college kids who want to go on a bike rally in the Himalayas but do not have the resources. The film is about how these kids deal with the threat of responsibility and impending adulthood, find love and make money in a fast growing and rapidly changing urban India.::Pramida Posanipalli

The film is a slice of life drama based in Hyderabad. It is a story about friends, who are from different parts of India & have come to live together. The texture tries to capture the old world charm in uber modern surroundings. It is a lighthearted depiction of self discovery, adventure, growing up, friendships and optimism. The film is set against the backdrop of an impending bike rally!::Anonymous
